duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead supplier quality management and ensure engineering, safety, regulatory, and quality requirements are met.
Perform advanced quality engineering tools and the Fortive Business System tools to achieve continuous improvement.
Drive supplier quality performance and perform quality system and process audits.
Analyze and report supplier product quality performance and Key Process Indicators.
Implement processes for defect prevention and reduction in variation at supplier base.
Conduct DFMEA and PFMEA activities and support continuous improvement initiatives.
Review supplier manufacturing processes and collaborate with them on process improvement and value enhancement opportunities.
Maintain good relationships with suppliers and participate in and lead kaizen events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering from an accredited institution (Master's preferred)
